org.springframework.boot.autoconfigure.transaction.jta

Class JtaAutoConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.boot.autoconfigure.transaction.jta.JtaAutoConfiguration

  • @ConditionalOnClass(value=javax.transaction.Transaction.class)
 @ConditionalOnProperty(prefix="spring.jta",
                       value="enabled",
                       matchIfMissing=true)
 @Import(value={org.springframework.boot.autoconfigure.transaction.jta.JndiJtaConfiguration.class,org.springframework.boot.autoconfigure.transaction.jta.BitronixJtaConfiguration.class,org.springframework.boot.autoconfigure.transaction.jta.AtomikosJtaConfiguration.class,NarayanaJtaConfiguration.class})

public class JtaAutoConfiguration
extends Object
